mapper.select: select distinct p.id, p.identifier, p.name, p.description, p.activated from (select * from tb_user_role where user_id=#{userId}) ur inner join tb_role_permission rp on ur.role_id=rp.role_id inner join tb_role r on ur.role_id=r.id inner join tb_permission p on rp.permission_id=p.id where r.activated=1 and p.activated=1
